full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYABS MGON RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GI SPRUL BA'I SKU MYUR 'BYON GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B ^MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG SOGS KHRI PA BLA MA RNAMS DANG, PHYAG MDZOD DZA SAG BLA MA DAM PA CHOS RAB RGYAS, T'A BLA MA SOG 'DI KHA'I LAS BYED THUN MONG DANG, SKU MDUN MKHAN PO BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS, ^SKU ZHABS GRVA TSANG GI DUS 'KHOR BA'I SMRAS BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS BCAS NAS BSKUL BAR BRTEN ^RGYAL MCHOG DE NYID KYI SLOB MA'I THA SHAL ^SH'AKYA'I @003A *, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS NAG ZLA'I NYER BDUN LA 'PHRAL DU BLA MA LHAR GSOL BA BTAB STE SBYAR BA'O, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
